definition: (said of sb else's wife) a good wife
worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
inside/inner/internal/within/interior
to help/to assist

sentences.english: I'm very fond of Maurice and I'd make him a good wife.
sentences.chinese: 我非常喜欢莫里斯，我会成为他的贤内助的。

sentences.english: He looked upon his wife as the better half.
sentences.chinese: 他把妻子看做是贤内助。

sentences.english: What's more, I prefer to be the better half.
sentences.chinese: 还有，我更想做个贤内助。

sentences.english: Everybody envies you for having such a good wife.
sentences.chinese: 人们都说你的夫人是位贤内助。

sentences.english: You can well count yourself fortunate in having such a good wife.
sentences.chinese: 你有这样一位贤内助，可算得幸福的了。

sentences.english: He wanted to be a cloud of crazy.
sentences.chinese: 自己想当云狂的贤内助。
